text:
Turpan, also referred to Turfan or Tulufan in Chinese, is an oasis county-level city in Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region of China.
Background.
Historically, Turpan is an important ancient stop on the Silk Road in China.[http://www.thesilkroadchina.com/tourist-map-of-silkroad.html] Turpan means 'the lowest place' in Uygur and 'the fertile land' in Turki. Now the city is a tourist spot with unique landscape, abundant historical relics and fertile farmland.
